column4: No, Xubuntu works very well, as fast as Ubuntu (with XGL/Beryl) loads on a 1.8 ghZ PC.  BTW, How do you know I'm using an iMac?
I've found even Xubuntu to be unusable slow on an iMac 233 with 64Mb ram (with 256Mb they're fine)
That said, these days I netboot the iMacs from a multicore LTSP server with lost of ram - speeds things up no end :-)
